Ok, so here is the thing, any artist who has done ntr always has a good art style and the art style is what trully atracts us, not the genre/tags, period, take for example, takeda hiromitsu, uruujima call, sanagi torajirou, fuetakishi, karasu, mozu k, tanishi, rocket monkey, dorachefu, chin, chimosaku, etc, etc, etc..., hell even ahemaru, i was there since the begining, i saw how he posted hardcore stuff on pixiv and then he posted a ntr of medaka box and BOOM, now he takes part on one of the biggest books, Angel Club, all of these artist has good art style and ntr is not the only genre they do, well takeda has been doing ntr lately, so yea, but he has vanilla works and theyre good
